abstract: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York, one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, gives money to Samantha Delgado to help her secure subsidized two-bedroom apartment in Long Island City in Queens.
lead_paragraph: Samantha Delgado’s younger son was born last year after 24 weeks of gestation and was given only a 15 percent chance of survival. His needs inspired her to study nursing.

headline.main: A Child, Born Prematurely, Who ‘Fights Because He Wants to Be Here’
headline.print_headline: A Child Who Earned the Nickname Samson

snippet: Samantha Delgado’s younger son was born last year after 24 weeks of gestation and was given only a 15 percent chance of survival. His needs inspired her to study nursing.
